markdownRemark.html:
Welcome to my blog where I‚Äôll ramble about web dev, video games, and anime. Will anyone read this? Who knows‚Ä¶

Maybe this‚Äôll be a good place to catalog my thoughts and see how they change over time. Considering how quickly the web moves, I‚Äôll probably end up with egg on my face, but it‚Äôll be a good time capsule to look back on. Already, what I thought was best practice in 2018 hadn‚Äôt necessarily translated into 2019, and it certainly won‚Äôt be the same in 2020.

Nah, I‚Äôll just delete the posts where I look stupid. üòè (No one look at the commit history pls.)
